english: Fee Standards for the Review and Issuance of Organic Labelling Approval Documents for Organic Agricultural Products and Organic Processed Agricultural Products
title: 進口有機農產品及有機農產加工品核發有機標示同意文件審查費收費標準

articles.content: These Standards are established in accordance with Article 10 of the Charges and Fees Act.
These Standards shall come into force on the date of promulgation.
